channel.title: BroadCasting Players
channel.description: I can't seem to find the code that sends other players to the client. I need this because I am fixing the teleport bug where if you teleport and do not leave a map area to other players you do not move. (The client and server become out of sync) There is a simple fix and that is to remove the player from all clients and re-create it. Thats why I need to know where the code is that sends out players. :D
